#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define ll long long int
#define s(x) scanf("%d", &x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld", &x)

int main()
{
    int t, i, ans, n, u = 0;
    s(t);
    while (t--) {
        s(n);
        int a[n], b[n];
        for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
            s(a[i]);
        for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
            s(b[i]);
        sort(a, a+n);
        sort(b, b+n);
        ans = 0;
        for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
            ans += abs(a[i]-b[i]);
        printf("Case %d: %d\n", ++u, ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
